characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing it from the battlefield. On a roll of a 6 it explodes and the hellish energies at its core are unleashed. Each unit within 2D6" suffers D6 mortal wounds unless it is a Psyker, in which case it suffers 2D3 mortal wounds instead.
